title: A comparison of different social inequalities (STUDENT TAKEOVER)
description:
In this episode, a group of lower 6th form Sociology students from Cokethorpe school in Oxfordshire debate whether social class, gender or ethnicity cause the largest inequalities. Many thanks to Sophia May, Caitlyn Alford, Lily Todeschini, Issy Stagg, Annabelle Vallance, Edith Wannell, Heidi Robertson and to their teacher, Louise Bowden for submitting the entry.

If you would like to send an entry for the show then please email Thesociologyshowpodcast@gmail.com
